message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, $115 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $105.  Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down to $110. It's still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $110 is still a bit high for me.  I'm firm on $105. This is my best offer, and I'm ready to close the deal if you're willing to accept.
